title: farm guard
content:
Hi guys! I need this font pleeease!

Claris :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414222915im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Farm_guard1_4811.jpg)
author: Clazdesigns

comments.content:
I suspect it is custom, but possibly based on Univers Extended Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414222915/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/")

Thanks, I think you are right but the Extended Bold font is a bit too thick and the regular Extended font is a bit too thin!! So I have thickened the regular font and customised that one!

Thanks for your help  
Cx
